#include<iostream>
#include<vector>
#include<set>
#include<string>
#include<cmath>
#include<stdio.h>
#include<algorithm>
#include<map>
#include<stack>
using namespace std;
map<char,int> prio;
stack<char> stk;
main()
{
	int t,len;
	string s;
	prio['(']=0;
	prio['+']=1;
	prio['-']=2;
	prio['*']=3;
	prio['/']=4;
	prio['^']=5;
	cin>>t;
	while(t--)
	{
		cin>>s;
		len=s.length();
		for(int i=0;i<len;i++)
		{
			//cout<<"stk size "<<stk.size()<<s[i]<<"\n";
			if(s[i]>='a'&&s[i]<='z')
			{cout<<s[i];continue;}
			if(s[i]=='(')
			{stk.push('(');continue;}
			if(s[i]==')')
			{
				while(stk.top()!='(')
				{
					cout<<stk.top();
					stk.pop();
				}
				stk.pop();
				continue;
			}
			//if(stk.empty())
			//{stk.push(s[i]);continue;}
			while(!stk.empty()&&prio[s[i]]<=prio[stk.top()])
			{
			cout<<stk.top();
			stk.pop();
			}
			stk.push(s[i]);
		}
		while(!stk.empty())
		{
			cout<<stk.top();
			stk.pop();
		}
		cout<<"\n";
	}
}
